text: One tiny pin-prick after one year of shielding for sister Abi! #DownSyndrome Yeyyyyyyyy!!!! 🎉🌟🎉🌟🎉🌟Amazing that something so inconspicuous can transform life so completely for us all. #COVID19 #vaccine #disability #NotAMorbidityStatistic #celebration #OxfordVaccineGroup https://t.co/BDccHdatIh
